# MCP eRegistrations BPA

MCP server for eRegistrations Business Process Administration (BPA) platform.

## Installation

```bash
uv sync
```

## Usage

```bash
uv run mcp-eregistrations-bpa
```

## Development

### Run tests

```bash
uv run pytest
```

### Linting

```bash
uv run ruff check .
```

### Type checking

```bash
uv run mypy .
```
